thread.title: The "Times" on India's Future.

author: tribuneindia.com
title: The "Times" on India's Future.
text: ON the question of India's future the Times feels compelled to make a sympathetic comment in connection with the question of representation of India at the Imperial Conference. Of the justice of this representation, the Times has no doubt; but it says that it is equally obvious that "any change will involve the consideration of certain somewhat delicate question." This is, we believe, the power of self-government, the lack of which, it says, kept out India from the Imperial Conference so long. Nevertheless the great Tory paper is disinclined to be explicit on the position and its sense of "delicacy" has prevented it from making an outspoken expression of its views.
